name: Dwarven Cave
description:
Created as part of a student assignment as a team, attempting to implement some basic level design principles. Unfortunately we didn't get to complete as much as we liked, but I think we succeeded in communicating the general idea behind our scene. Most of the assets were created by us.

Student Project by:

  • Joel Hudson

Contributions

Assisted with concept, assisted with layout, post processing, audio, 3D modelling, object placement.

  • Peter Southard

Contributions

Assisted with concept, primary contributor to layout and level mesh, lighting, 3D modelling, object placement.

  • Mitch Campbell
  • Kyle Watson

Install Instructions

Needs 7zip

1. Download the .7z file of the game 

 2. Unzip the .7z file 

 3. Click the .exe and run it 

 4. Explore the environment
